content: As an optional secret boss, Cyan Loong can be found once you reach Turtle Island on the Bitter Lake. You can find his frozen body apparently fishing off the side of the "island" by heading right from the Turtle Island Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cyan_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Cyan Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Cyan Loong'.
The content is as follows:
As an optional secret boss, Cyan Loong can be found once you reach Turtle Island on the Bitter Lake. You can find his frozen body apparently fishing off the side of the "island" by heading right from the Turtle Island Shrine.
